name: infest
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of animals and insects that carry disease) to cause a problem by being present in large numbers: be infested with The barn was infested with rats.

Related word
infestation
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of insects and some animals) to be present in large numbers, sometimes causing disease or damage: When we first moved in, the apartment was infested with cockroaches.
